scripts.canaryrelease: npm run build && release pre && npm run registry-publish
scripts.release:patch: npm run build && release patch && npm run registry-publish
scripts.release:minor: npm run build && release minor && npm run registry-publish
scripts.release:major: npm run build && release major && npm run registry-publish
scripts.registry-publish: npm run --prefix packages/adaptableblotter registry-publish && npm run --prefix packages/adaptableblotter-react-aggrid registry-publish
scripts.build: npm run build-core && npm run build-react
